text:
IOWA STATE COLLEGE
OF AGRICULTURE AND MECHANIC ARTS
AMES, IOWA
ENGINEERING EXTENSION SERVICE
May 16, 1939
Mr. James Ebel
Chief Engineer
WILL
Urbana, Illinois
Dear Mr. Ebel,
At the N.A.E.B. meeting at Columbus, Ohio^Carl
told about the tests which you are running on recording
equipment. We will of course be interested in the re¬
sults when you have them available.
In the meantime I was wondering if you had available
any copies of the tests which you are giving the equip¬
ment. We have new Radiotone recording equipment and
for my own satisfaction I would like to give it a good
test. Carl says that your tests have been carefully
worked out and approved by the manufacturer's. Hence
it would give me a standard by which to make my tests.
I would appreciate any information along this line
that you can give me.
Yours very truly,
W. E. Stewart
Chief Engineer - WOI
WES: mo
